words.dialogueTitle: New Council Employee Helps Community Centre 2
words.example: _We cater to everyone_/ _The classes are for everyone_. | _We have strength training_, _boxing, dance_, | _and classes for seniors_, _mothers and young children_. | _We run/have classes every day_.

words.dialogueTitle: New Council Employee Helps Community Centre 2
words.example: _I appreciate that_, _I have only been working at the council_ | _for a few weeks_. | _So I have a lot to learn_ _about the center_.
words.exampleChinese: 谢谢。我在市政厅才工作了几个星期，| 所以这个中心还有很多需要我学习的内容。
words.context: _I appreciate that_, _I have only been working at the council_ | _for a few weeks_. | _So I have a lot to learn_ _about the center_.
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: I have only been working at the council

words.dialogueTitle: New Council Employee Helps Community Centre 2
words.example: _I hope you can take over_ _all the fitness programs_. | _There are too many programs_, _and I can't cope_ | _I'm swamped_ _I can't handle them all_.
words.exampleChinese: 我希望把全部健身项目给你接管。| 项目太多了，我忙不过来了。
words.context: _I hope you can take over_ _all the fitness programs_. | _There are too many programs_, _and I can't cope_ | _I'm swamped_ _I can't handle them all_.

words.dialogueTitle: New Council Employee Helps Community Centre 2
words.example: _That's really great_, _I'm happy you can give any suggestions_ | _to improve our programs_. | _I myself have always been_ _looking for new ideas_.
words.exampleChinese: 那真是太好了。我很高兴您能对我们的活动提出任何改进建议。| 我自己也一直在寻求新的想法。
words.context: _That's really great_, _I'm happy you can give any suggestions_ | _to improve our programs_. | _I myself have always been_ _looking for new ideas_.

words.dialogueTitle: New Council Employee Helps Community Centre 2
words.example: _The local library is_ _located at the center too, I believe_. | _There are certainly a lot to manage_. | _It must be a busy place to work_.
words.exampleChinese: 我记得当地图书馆也在中心里。| 要管理的东西确实很多。这里工作肯定挺忙的。
words.context: _The local library is_ _located at the center too, I believe_. | _There are certainly a lot to manage_. | _It must be a busy place to work_.

words.dialogueTitle: New Council Employee Helps Community Centre 2
words.example: _That's a lot. I'm sure_ _there's software that can help_ _manage or track all these_. | _I'll do some research first_.
words.exampleChinese: 真不少啊。| 我相信有软件能帮助管理或追踪这些的。| 我先研究研究。
words.context: _That's a lot. I'm sure_ _there's software that can help_ _manage or track all these_. | _I'll do some research first_.

words.example: _Hey, the office mentioned_ _you'd drop by_ _to visit the site again today_. | _I bet you'll be pleased_ _with the progress_.
words.exampleChinese: 嗨，办公室那边说| 你今天要再来工地一趟。| 我相信你会对进度满意的。
words.context: _Hey, the office mentioned_ _you'd drop by_ _to visit the site again today_. | _I bet you'll be pleased_ _with the progress_.
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: I bet you'll be pleased

words.example: _No problem at all_. | _I feel like I check_ _the construction plans_ _blueprints_ | _every night when I get home_. | _So, I know exactly_ _what each room will look like_.
words.exampleChinese: 没问题。| 我感觉我每天晚上回家| 都会看施工图纸。| 所以每个房间具体会是什么样子的，| 我都清清楚楚。
words.context: _No problem at all_. | _I feel like I check_ _the construction plans_ _blueprints_ | _every night when I get home_. | _So, I know exactly_ _what each room will look like_.

words.exampleChinese: 我也这么认为，| 但台面太短了，| 那我换成更长的。
words.context: _I think so too_, _but the benchtop is too short_, | _so I'll change it back_ _for a longer one_.

words.dialogueTitle: A New Creamy Leather Lounge Chair 2
words.example: _Creamy leather sounds_ _a perfect choice_. | _How about we grab a slice of cake_ _with our coffee to celebrate_?
words.exampleChinese: 奶油色的皮革，| 这选择听着太完美了。| 要不咱俩喝咖啡时| 再加块蛋糕，庆祝一下？
words.context: _Creamy leather sounds_ _a perfect choice_. | _How about we grab a slice of cake_ _with our coffee to celebrate_?
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: How about we grab a slice of cake

words.term: i spotted a cream-colored leather sofa
words.dialogueTitle: A New Creamy Leather Lounge Chair 2
words.phonetic: UK /i spotted a creamcolored leather sofa/
words.example: _I spotted a cream-colored_ _leather sofa that I really like_, | _but it isn't cheap_. | _I'm not sure which payment method_ _makes the most sense_.
words.exampleChinese: 我看上了一款奶油色皮质沙发，| 很对我胃口，可价格不算低。| 我不太确定最划算的| 付款方式是怎样的。
words.context: _I spotted a cream-colored_ _leather sofa that I really like_, | _but it isn't cheap_. | _I'm not sure which payment method_ _makes the most sense_.
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: I spotted a cream-colored

words.dialogueTitle: A New Creamy Leather Lounge Chair 2
words.example: _I know that_. | _Using lay-by only costs a few dollars_, | _and I'm not in a hurry_ _to take the sofa home_.
words.exampleChinese: 我知道。| 预留商品并且分期付款的话，| 只要几块钱。| 而且，我也不急着| 把沙发带回家。
words.context: _I know that_. | _Using lay-by only costs a few dollars_, | _and I'm not in a hurry_ _to take the sofa home_.
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: and I'm not in a hurry

words.dialogueTitle: A New Creamy Leather Lounge Chair 2

words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.example: _Everyone got excited_ _when the new doctor arrived_. | _The previous doctor_ _moved back to the city_, | _and it took a long time_ _before the replacement showed up_.
words.exampleChinese: _新的医生一来_ _大家都很兴奋_。| _之前的医生_ _搬回城里_，| _换医生_ _又等了好一阵子_。
words.context: _Everyone got excited_ _when the new doctor arrived_. | _The previous doctor_ _moved back to the city_, | _and it took a long time_ _before the replacement showed up_.

words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.example: _Great, I didn't realize_ _you could do that_. | _I have allergies_, _so I prefer oat milk_. | _But mine's almost gone_.
words.exampleChinese: _太好了_，_我都不知道_ _你可以这样做_，| _我有过敏_，_所以我更喜欢_ _喝燕麦奶_。| _但是现在_ _快喝完了_。
words.context: _Great, I didn't realize_ _you could do that_. | _I have allergies_, _so I prefer oat milk_. | _But mine's almost gone_.

words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.example: _Okay, most people in this town_ _buy dairy or soy milk_, | _so I have them in stock_. _I can order oat milk_ _from my supplier for you_.
words.exampleChinese: _好的_，_这里大多数人_ _喝乳制品或豆奶_，| _所以这些_ _都有货_。_不过我想我可以_ _从我供应商那里_ _给你订燕麦奶_。
words.context: _Okay, most people in this town_ _buy dairy or soy milk_, | _so I have them in stock_. _I can order oat milk_ _from my supplier for you_.

words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.example: _It is. It takes a while_ _to get to the city_ _and time to get used to everything here_. | _I hope the sense of community_ _can make up for it_.
words.exampleChinese: _确实_，_去城里要花点时间_，_这里的生活节奏_ _也要慢慢适应_。| _我希望这里的_ _社区氛围_ _能弥补这些不便_。
words.context: _It is. It takes a while_ _to get to the city_ _and time to get used to everything here_. | _I hope the sense of community_ _can make up for it_.

words.term: delivered along with my other goods
words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.phonetic: UK /ˈdelivered ˈalong ˈwith ˈmy ˈother ˈgoods/
words.example: _That should be fine_. _I restock every one to two weeks_, | _so I'll make sure to order enough_. | _I'll see if I can_ _have your oat milk_ _delivered along with my other goods_.
words.exampleChinese: _应该没问题_。_我每一到两周_ _补货一次_，| _所以我会确保_ _订够量的_。| _我会看看能不能_ _把你的燕麦奶_ _和我的其他货_ _一起送来_。
words.context: _That should be fine_. _I restock every one to two weeks_, | _so I'll make sure to order enough_. | _I'll see if I can_ _have your oat milk_ _delivered along with my other goods_.

words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.example: _I'm not planning to_ _move back to the city_, | _but I do miss city amenities_, _especially those shops_. | _You could get everything_ _in one shopping centre_.
words.exampleChinese: _我现在不打算_ _搬回城里_，| _但是_，_我确实很想念_ _城里的东西_，_尤其是那些商店_。| _想买什么_ _都能在一个商场里_ _搞定_。
words.context: _I'm not planning to_ _move back to the city_, | _but I do miss city amenities_, _especially those shops_. | _You could get everything_ _in one shopping centre_.
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: but I do miss city amenities

words.dialogueTitle: Ordering Oat Milk in a Small Town
words.example: _Yes, I've found that_ _people in this town are very friendly_, | _and through work_ _I've already met most of them_. | _You'd never get that kind of warmth_ _in a big city_!
words.exampleChinese: _对_，_我发现_ _小镇上的人_ _都很友好_，| _我通过工作_，_已经认识了_ _大半个镇上的人_。| _这种亲切感_ _在大城市里_ _可体验不到_。

words.example: _Hello, nice to see you_. _I hope you're already settling in_. | _It must be a big change for you_ _to live in this small town_. | _If you need anything_, _just let me know_.

words.term: a bit far from the city

words.phonetic: UK /a bit far from the city/

words.dialogueTitle: Friendly Support for the New Town Doctor
words.example: _The people in this small town are_ | _all really lovely_. | _I'm adjusting well_. | _My little clinic has been open for_ | _over six months_, | _and through work_ _I've met nearly half the town_.

words.context: _The people in this small town are_ | _all really lovely_. | _I'm adjusting well_. | _My little clinic has been open for_ | _over six months_, | _and through work_ _I've met nearly half the town_.

words.exampleChinese: 明白了，工作车辆很重要。| 那么，被偷的是一辆面包车？| 听起来你需要给保险公司提供一份盗窃报案单。| 告诉我你最后见到它的地点和时间。
words.context: _Understood, work vehicles are crucial_. | _So, a van was taken_? | _Sounds like you need a theft report_ _for the insurer_. | _Tell me where and when_ _you last saw it_.
words.note: Fuzzy matched with: Understood work vehicles are crucial

words.term: always jumps on everyone it meets
words.phonetic: UK /ˈalways ˈjumps ˈon ˈeveryone ˈit ˈmeets/
words.example: _My dog's so friendly_—_always jumps on everyone it meets_. | _I really need to_ _pay extra attention_. | _Any other dog-walking dos and don'ts_ _I need to look out for_?
words.exampleChinese: 我的狗狗很热情，见人就扑，| 我还真的要多留意。| 还有什么其他遛狗时要注意的吗？

words.example: _That's great. My dog loves splashing around_ _in the water_, | _rolling in the sand_, | _and chasing seagulls_. | _Are there any spots where_ _dogs aren't allowed_?
words.exampleChinese: 太棒了。我的狗特别喜欢在水里踩来踩去，| 在沙子里打滚，| 还会追那些海鸥。| 请问有哪些地方是不允许狗狗去的吗？
words.context: _That's great. My dog loves splashing around_ _in the water_, | _rolling in the sand_, | _and chasing seagulls_. | _Are there any spots where_ _dogs aren't allowed_?

words.example: _Indeed, dogs aren't allowed in certain spots_ _like kids' playgrounds_, | _sports ovals, and some beaches_. | _Just look out for the signs_ _before you go in_.

words.exampleChinese: 好多邻居都看到过呢，| 对他都快闻风丧胆了。| 他开车像疯了一样快，| 我们都很担心孩子们的安全。
words.context: _Plenty of our neighbours_ _have seen him too_ | _and are almost_ _scared stiff of him_. | _He drives insanely fast_, | _and we're all really worried about_ _the kids' safety_.

words.dialogueTitle: Resident Alerts Police to Speeding Driver
words.example: _Actually, every day when I_ _take my kid to school_, | _I see him_ _speeding past in his car_. | _The most recent time_ _was around 7:30 this morning_, | _right at the entrance_ _of our apartment complex_.
words.exampleChinese: 其实，我每天送孩子去学校的时候，| 都看到他车子飞速开过去。| 最近的一次发生在今天早上七点半左右，| 就在我们公寓小区门口。
words.context: _Actually, every day when I_ _take my kid to school_, | _I see him_ _speeding past in his car_. | _The most recent time_ _was around 7:30 this morning_, | _right at the entrance_ _of our apartment complex_.

words.dialogueTitle: Resident Alerts Police to Speeding Driver
words.example: _I hear you. People should drive slowly_ _in an apartment complex_, | _especially near kids' play areas_ _or sidewalks_. | _Where and when did the speeding happen_?
words.exampleChinese: 我理解。大家在公寓小区里开车一定要慢点，| 尤其是在孩子玩的地方或人行道附近。| 超速是在什么地方、什么时候发生的？
words.context: _I hear you. People should drive slowly_ _in an apartment complex_, | _especially near kids' play areas_ _or sidewalks_. | _Where and when did the speeding happen_?

words.dialogueTitle: Resident Alerts Police to Speeding Driver
words.example: _We'll do everything we can_ _to address this_. | _If you spot anything like this again_, | _please let us know immediately_.

words.context: _We'll do everything we can_ _to address this_. | _If you spot anything like this again_, | _please let us know immediately_.

words.dialogueTitle: Resident Alerts Police to Speeding Driver
words.example: _Thank you, officer. We all hope_ _he can understand the consequences_ _of what he has done_ | _and can stop speeding_. | _We really want to see_ _some real improvements_.
words.exampleChinese: 谢谢警察同志。我们都希望他能明白这样做的后果，| 不要再超速了。| 我们想看到明显的改善。
words.context: _Thank you, officer. We all hope_ _he can understand the consequences_ _of what he has done_ | _and can stop speeding_. | _We really want to see_ _some real improvements_.

words.dialogueTitle: Resident Alerts Police to Speeding Driver
words.example: _That does sound risky_. | _Do you happen to know_ _the car's make and model_, | _or any other identifying info_?

words.dialogueTitle: Resident Alerts Police to Speeding Driver

words.term: and adjust to everything all over again

words.example: _Absolutely, staying put would be ideal_. | _We don't want the kids_ _to have to switch schools_ | _and adjust to everything all over again_.
words.exampleChinese: 可不是嘛，能不动地方最好了。| 我们不想让孩子们又要换学校，| 又要重新适应一遍周围的一切。
words.context: _Absolutely, staying put would be ideal_. | _We don't want the kids_ _to have to switch schools_ | _and adjust to everything all over again_.

words.context: _Exactly. The market is_ _flooded with listings now_, | _but it might take a bit_ _to find the right one_. | _Any luck so far_?

words.example: _Hey! I'm the lead trainer_ _at the Dog Training Center_. | _My coworker mentioned_ _you just adopted_ _an adorable male puppy_. | _What can I help you with_?
words.exampleChinese: 你好！我是狗狗训练中心的首席训犬师。| 我同事说你刚领养了一只可爱的小公狗。| 我能帮你些什么？
words.context: _Hey! I'm the lead trainer_ _at the Dog Training Center_. | _My coworker mentioned_ _you just adopted_ _an adorable male puppy_. | _What can I help you with_?

words.example: _That's amazing! My kids are ten and eight_, _and I hope they could learn_ _how to take care of the puppy_, | _you know, stuff like walking him_, _grooming him_, _and feeding him properly_.

words.context: _That's amazing! My kids are ten and eight_, _and I hope they could learn_ _how to take care of the puppy_, | _you know, stuff like walking him_, _grooming him_, _and feeding him properly_.

words.example: _Absolutely! We offer_ _a six-week course here_ | _that covers basic commands_ _and hands-on handling techniques_.

words.context: _Absolutely! We offer_ _a six-week course here_ | _that covers basic commands_ _and hands-on handling techniques_.

words.dialogueTitle: Making Use of a Spare Skip Bin
words.example: _Hey! The first few months_ _were really tough_, | _but gladly business is getting busy now_. | _Compared to before_, _I'm way busier these days_!

words.context: _Actually, I could lend a hand_. | _You probably saw_ _that I got a skip bin_ _delivered here last month_.
